question: What is the main function of the National Development Council?
option3: To review the working of the National Plan from time to time
answer: To review the working of the National Plan from time to time
explanation: NDC was set up on 6 August 1952 to strengthen and mobilize the effort and resources of the nation in support of the Five Year Plans made by Planning Commission, to promote common economic policies in all vital spheres, and to ensure the balanced and rapid development of all parts of the country.
